ygData.subject: Re: Mail Run in Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: What I did to find out where the agents from the Freeport side were was ask their leader. example: Who is Sivina Lutewhisper? The response, at least in
ygData.messageBody:
What I did to find out where the agents from the Freeport side were was ask
their leader.

example: "Who is Sivina Lutewhisper?"

The response, at least in Freeport, was the location of that agent. I
asked for all 4 and was given the places. I've only visited 2 of the four
so far. I love this quest! And I agree that it has potential.

Kendrin, warrior-bard of Mithaniel Marr, on Tunare


According to the illustrious TommyC...
:)From: "TommyC" <uber_sorcerer@...>
:)
:)when asked about agents Tralyn Marsinger comes up with this list:
:)Sivina Lutewhisper
:)Marton Stringsinger
:)Ticar Lorestring
:)Mistrana Two-Notes who is found in house in west Karana Barbarian Fishing
:)Village
:)If anyone knows where the other 3 are please tell me
